collection.name: #60B0FFStunt Rally one
collection.descr: The first, easy, original collection on Stunt Rally logo track. Each letter except river l, has just one gem, including the floating loop.

collection.name: #20FF20Stunt Rally more
collection.descr: Collection on Stunt Rally logo track. Endurance type with many more gems to collect. Each letter except river l, has few gems, including the floating loop. Gems are also on terrain, rocks or in water.

collection.name: #F0F020Stunt Rally hard
collection.descr: Hard Stunt Rally track collection. Gems placed in difficult to get places, but not that high.

collection.name: #FF8020Stunt Rally extreme
collection.descr: Extreme Stunt Rally track collection. Highest locations for gems. Requires flying to get on top. Use any nearby hill to jump off high in direction towards gem.

collection.name: Dunes rocky tops
collection.descr: Easy collection with terrain cars for places on top of rocky hills in desert.

collection.name: #90E0E0Loops #FF8030in air
collection.descr: Tricky collection of gems in air below loops top, needs falling down from middle or other place. Moving camera view to side makes it much easier.

collection.name: Rocky jungle gems
collection.descr: Difficult to get place for cars in tricky, rocky dips in jungle, and few on hills. Careful for damage and use rewind to get back.

collection.name: Savanna Hills
collection.descr: Gems located around a nice savannah terrain, mostly on hill tops.

collection.name: #C0E070Hills #FF6030in air
collection.descr: Difficult to collect gems, located on top of or below all balloons. Using fastest drone you can jump off from terrain and fly to anywhere. It's a matter of aim and patience at that high speed though.

collection.name: SBridge terrain
collection.descr: Gems located on terrain tops, and in bumpy places. Endurance type, careful for damage, no rewind.

collection.name: #D0D040LowJumps terrain
collection.descr: Gems located on terrain tops collecting with hovercraft.

collection.name: #FFC040HighJumps nearby
collection.descr: Gems are on side of jumps, requiring to jump slightly to side to collect them. Rewind makes it quicker to get all from each place.

collection.name: #F0F0B0Technical floating
collection.descr: Desert gems floating in air, requiring to jump off from road or nearby terrain slope to get them.

collection.name: Jungle fun hideout
collection.descr: Jungle fun track with hidden gems.

collection.name: Bumpy hilly bike trip
collection.descr: Mud Bumps track with lots of gems in various places. Many on top of hills, some in dips, few in flat places near slopes.

collection.name: Jungle temple hideout
collection.descr: Small but dense jungle track with hidden gems.

collection.name: Jungle temple treasure
collection.descr: Small but dense jungle track with hidden gems.

collection.name: Mad Mntn Dark
collection.descr: Mad Mntn track in dark with heavy rain. Difficult places for gems, many on hexrock platforms and on top of caves or hills. But with Spaceship it's easier and softer to navigate here.

collection.name: Gems on Greece hills
collection.descr: Few gems to collect on vast Greece landscape, on top of hills with good views.

collection.name: Canyon hills
collection.descr: Plenty of gems on canyon hills, few under bridges and on platforms for look out. For fast hovering vehicles.

collection.name: Volcanic dark islands
collection.descr: Gems located on hill tops and on few small islands, in almost dark.

collection.name: Shore islands
collection.descr: Hovercraft visit to small islands, buildings and edge locations on Shore track.

collection.name: Hole around
collection.descr: Tricky gems located in round circles on the Hole track. No boost or rewind so need to gain momentum to reach top edge and not cause damage.

collection.name: Hole top
collection.descr: Hole track, with gems on top of hills, also on horizon.

collection.name: Hole pillars
collection.descr: Small set of gems on high pillars away from start of Hole track, on horizon.

collection.name: Hairpin tops
collection.descr: Canyon Hairpins track with gems on the very top of those hairpin hills.

collection.name: Castle #80C0F0towers
collection.descr: Forest Castle track with gems close to road and on top towers.

collection.name: Castle #FFD020candles
collection.descr: Forest Castle track with gems on the very top towers, and tricky ones located after drop below usually in the middle of tower walls.

collection.name: Castle #F04040chandeliers
collection.descr: Castle track with 3 floating sets of 6 gems and 1 higher, forming big chandeliers in air. Needs some rewinding to catch them right when falling.

collection.name: Autumn Orange hills
collection.descr: Rainy autumn track with gems on top of close hills. Few also inside, near trees.

collection.name: Frozen Garden
collection.descr: Mostly on slippery icy hills. No problem with boost.

collection.name: GlassStairs #A040F0terrain
collection.descr: Very long exploration, for gems in various terrain places, some harder to get.

collection.name: GlassStairs #F09010hard
collection.descr: Difficult, extensive collection of various gems. Few suspended in air, some on top of loops and pipes.

collection.name: GlassStairs #F060B0Extreme
collection.descr: Many gems in extremely difficult locations. Hidden under glass pipes or suspended above.

collection.name: GlassStairs #2090FFcrystal harvest
collection.descr: Collecting crystals from hexagonal formations in suspended places.

collection.name: GlassStairs #A0B0C0structure repairs
collection.descr: GlassStairs track, visiting places on buildings. Gems with not an easy way to get to them.

collection.name: #B0A0D0Satellite visits
collection.descr: Easy collection, each satellite antenna (near road) has a gem, usually in front.

collection.name: Crystal Islands
collection.descr: Crystal gems in somewhat hidden places on islands.

collection.name: #80C000Temp test easy
collection.descr: Easy test all. Times: less than 6 sec for gold, 8 silver, 10 bronze.

collection.name: #80C000Temp test all
collection.descr: Easy test cars.

collection.name: #80C000Temp test hard
collection.descr: Easy test cars.

collection.name: #D0F060Circle easy
collection.descr: Simple test.

collection.name: Test Hills
collection.descr: Simple test terrain.

collection.name: #A0C0F0Terrains hover
collection.descr: Terrains test track, with any hovering vehicle.
